activities.message: I forgot to change the report's title. Can you change it to "I made CEO's bounty payment!" for me please?
Thank you again for participating in the #h12006 CTF!

Hello and congrats on winning the #h12006 CTF! On Thursday, June 25th we plan to do a live stream and talk about our latest CTF. Would you be interested in joining us to chat about your experience with the CTF? 

Thanks,
Ben

Hi @nahamsec, thank you very much! :) Regarding the live stream, I appreciate that. Thanks but I can't join you :( It was an awesome CTF. I had so much fun. Before disclosing the report, can you change the title to "[H1-2006 2020] I made the CEO's bounty payment!" please?

Regards,
Bugra
